attributes.action: Let David Moyes Keep His Job
attributes.additional_details:
On behalf of football fans across the nation, I appeal for you to do all in your power to prevent the sacking of David William Moyes (Manchester United Manager).
This truly remarkable man has broken record upon record since his appointment in July 2013. In his short stint in charge of MUFC, he has done his utmost best to benefit and aid other teams in the league. If this is not a true act of kindness, I do not know what is.
I hope you speak to the American Glazer family, and explain how important British managers are to the integrity of the league.
